alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 2:45PM EST until January 13 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THURSDAY TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of one to three tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Southeastern St. Lawrence, Southern Franklin, Western Clinton and Western Essex Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM Thursday to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Scattered power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be difficult to hazardous which will likely affect the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest ice accumulations will occur in the eastern portions of the Adirondacks, especially in mid to high terrain above 1000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex
